question.para: I have the demo running with mapserver 3.3.011 without problems. However, when I try running it with 3.4 i get the following error message: msLoadMap(): Unknown identifier. (SHADESET):(6).

answer.para: The new version uses a unified symbol file format which means you can store all symbols in one file. This allows for inline definitions (i.e. within a mapfile) of symbols and more straight forward mapscript access. Anyway here's what's needed to switch:

listitem.para: The lines starting with SHADESET, MARKERSET, AND LINESET and the last END keyword should be deleted.
Make the new symbols.sym file by concatenating the three symbol files together.

answer.para: The new symbols.sym file is also avialable online at http://www2.dmsolutions.ca/mapserver/dl/symbols-for-ms34.sym
